com.nhn.android.maps

Class NMapOverlayItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapOverlayItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NMapPOIitem

    public class NMapOverlayItem
extends java.lang.Object
    The basic component of any NMapItemizedOverlay.

        Parameters:

        snippet - Snippet text of this item.

      • boundCenterTop

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable boundCenterTop(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Adjusts a drawable's bounds so that (0,0) is a pixel in the center of the top row of the drawable. Useful for "pin"-like graphics. For convenience, returns the same drawable that was passed in.
        Parameters:
        drawable - the drawable to adjust
        Returns:
        the same drawable that was passed in.

      • boundCenterBottom

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable boundCenterBottom(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Adjusts a drawable's bounds so that (0,0) is a pixel in the center of the bottom row of the drawable. Useful for "pin"-like graphics. For convenience, returns the same drawable that was passed in.
        Parameters:
        drawable - the drawable to adjust
        Returns:
        the same drawable that was passed in.

      • boundCenter

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable boundCenter(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Adjusts a drawable's bounds so that (0,0) is the center center of the drawable. Useful for "waypoint badge"-like graphics. For convenience, returns the same drawable that was passed in.
        Parameters:
        drawable - the drawable to adjust
        Returns:
        the same drawable that was passed in.
